description.en:
Contains 5 short stories:
[ol]
[*] Hissatsu! Madonna Densetsu
Himeno's met her match in beauty, but it just so happens that Mikoto is a guy!

[*] Gekikara Baby!
Hokuto is a strong girl who hates playboys. You'll find her reason why.

[*] Tekken Baby!
Maki is hiding the fact that she's abnormally strong from her boyfriend, Chigusa, who isn't the type to be strong himself, but she doesn't have anything to worry about?

[*] Fire Baby
Hino is very passionate about her table tennis, and won't stop until she beats anyone who insults her beloved sport!

[*] Tennen Bad Boy
Kiyoka knows something about Amano-kun that no one else knows.
[/ol]
(From: MU)
